text: Kazimierz Julian Kutz (16 February 1929 – 18 December 2018) was a Polish movie director, author, journalist and politician. He was born in Katowice, Poland. His best known director works were Salt of the Black Earth, Pearl in the Crown and Reverted. From 1997 to 2009, Kutz was a Deputy Senator. Kutz died on 18 December 2018 in Warsaw from respiratory failure at the age of 89.Kazimierz Kutz nie żyje.
